scripts.test-web: npm run build && npm run build-web && browserify -i util -o test/web.js -e test/entry.js -im && open test/web.html
scripts.build-web: tsc -d && cp dist/aontu.js dist/aontu.min.js && browserify -o dist/aontu.min.js -e dist/aontu.js -s Aontu -im -i assert -p tinyify
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build && npm test
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.repo-publish: npm run clean && npm i && npm run repo-publish-quick
scripts.repo-publish-quick: npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test && npm run test-web && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
